content: **this pattern is available for free on my blog or you can purchase the ad-free printable pdf above ** the dude blanket is part of the dude collection a collection of crochet designs for men this blanket is simple and sturdy just like most men like it pattern difficulty easy pattern comes with instructions for customizing the size of your blanket all of my patterns are thoroughly tested by experienced pattern testers and fellow designers to ensure you get a pattern that is easy to read and follow all of my patterns are in american terms due to the nature of the pdf files sales i will not refund any patterns however i am always available via email or a message here on ravelry if you have any questions about the patterns **love this pattern stay up to date on all things two brothers blankets including new patterns releases and fun events by subscribing to my newsletter ** 1 you may sell what you produce from my patterns but the pattern itself is copyrighted and may not be shared or changed in part or in whole my photos are also copyrighted and may never be used to sell the products 1 https //www twobrothersblankets com/subscribe/
